Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
25.07.2011 GB SCR16556 Replaced the GSET by the GSBU
02.08.2010 SH SCR15201 Removed test on IFIL_ID to switch language for
translation to client language if known else to 'GB'
13.02.2009 SH SCR14393 Added test "5. RF-MF: Correction invoices not accepted"
02.10.2008 SH SCR13938 Added test "4 Invoices in wrong currency"
22.02.2008 SH SCR13420 Test2/3 Extended test on SCHT with SCHT_INVAMOUNTHASH
'or = sum (NFIN_INVAMOUNTI)'
-- If called from website the error text must be in client language, else in
general language
-- Reset output parameters
-- Store system language, uses to reset language if switched to client or
general language
... start validations if file has to be rejected
-- 1. All invoices with amount 0
-- 2. The same file is currently handled
... calc NFIN totals uses for Range on SCHT
-- 3. Duplicate schedule
... calc NFIN totals uses for Range on SCHT
(Info: Count NFIN_INVAMOUNTI<0 is also used in test 5)
-- 4. Invoices in wrong currency
-- 5. RF-MF: Correction invoices not accepted
... only if not already calculated in test 3
-- If at least one invoice exists where NFIN_INVAMOUNTI <> 0 then it's allowed
to book the file

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(abs(NFIN_INVAMOUNTI)) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/NFIN where NFIN_NFIR_NO = :2 for fetch only
select cast(sum(NFIN_INVAMOUNTI) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/NFIN where NFIN_NFIR_NO = :2 for fetch only
select count(*) from :1/NFIN where NFIN_NFIR_NO = :2 and NFIN_INVAMOUNTI > 0 for fetch only
select count(*) from :1/NFIN where NFIN_NFIR_NO = :2 and NFIN_INVAMOUNTI < 0 for fetch only

Text.val: (test on not older than date() - 31)
-- Fetch first invoice from SCHI (see usage of index)
-- Fetch first invoice from NFIN
-- If the first invoice in the file is the same as the first invoice in the
database then it's a duplicate schedule (some clients send often the same
schedule amount but with different invoices)
-- Switch to client language or 'GB' to translate error text
... if called via website
-- Switch back to system language if changed, see T.S.
-- Store error text according to detected error
-- Stop further testing in case of error

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Invoices in other currency as client currency not allowed')
MlsTrans ('Correcting invoices not accepted for this client')
